April Maptime...No Foolin'

This past Wednesday's Maptime was a hit with 16 geo folk from print cartography to web dev. Presos on CamliStore, Python and Geodata BFFs, and SpatialDev Project Management Tools. We're meeting up again this Friday, April 4 for morning coffee and brekkie so bring your projects, ideas, and appetite to Glyph Cafe and Art Space.

Rafa Gutierrez
